publishMessage.description: The message displayed on the notification sent to a user when an feed item is published

deleteMessage.description: The message displayed on the notification sent to a user when an feed item is published deleted

resolveMessage.description: The message displayed on the notification sent to a user when an feed item is resolved

unresolveMessage.description: The message displayed on the notification sent to a user when an feed item is unresolved

showMessage.description: The message displayed on the notification sent to a user when an feed item is shown

hideMessage.description: The message displayed on the notification sent to a user when an feed item is hidden
